page.title: 05A MORNING IN JASON's LIFE.
page.content: I get up at 8 a.m. get dressed and have a cup of coffee.We travel to school by car and arrive at O8.55.I go into the cloakroom and hang up my coat. Then we go to assembly in the hall.We listen to a story from either Mr.Barlow or Mr.Craven and then we have a prayer and hymm and then we go back to class. Before play time we have a choice of either some written work or some maths and then at 10.35 we go out to play until 11.OO.In the hour to dinner we swap over what we've been doing like if we did maths we'd swap to written work and vice.versa .At 12.oo we go for our dinner break.
